name: punchline (itch)
description:
Punchline is a fast, MMO, action/strategy game like nothing else.

How to play?  Press the space bar.

Badges?  Yep - lots, like the super rare "10 punches per second"!

Clothes?  Power-ups?  Bots?  All of them and more.

You can play for free in the browser or download the full version below.  It's all free during the beta phase.

Standard Bot - protects a square for 1 day.Hammer - adds damage to each punchJazz Hands - bring the pain!Slime PunchNinja StarsTranq Dart - put the other team to sleepAnd many more!!!

Join our Discord server to know when your squares are under attack!  https://discord.gg/Ppb7uqT
